string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: What is the primary focus of studying digital electronics?
Why is it important to recognize the changes in digital electronics over time?
Which of the following is not related to digital electronics?
Which of the following is NOT a basic logic gate?
In digital electronics, what does the term "bit" stand for?
What do you call the building block of digital electronics?
Which Logic Gate produces the output of 1 when one input is 1?
What numbers are used in binary?
Which Logic Gate is also known as an “inverter”?
How many input combinations are possible for a 2-input logic gate?
Which logic gate is commonly used to perform binary addition in digital circuits?
Which digital logic gate returns a true (1) output when both of its inputs are true (1)?
What is the complement of the logical AND operation?
What is the role of a truth table in analyzing logic circuits?
In digital electronics, what do logic gates perform?
What does a multiplexer do in a logic circuit?
What is the purpose of a flip-flop in digital circuits?
Which logic gate has the same output as an OR gate followed by a NOT gate?
What is the purpose of an ADC (Analog-to-Digital Converter) in digital electronics?
What is the primary role of a counter in digital electronics?
What is the Boolean expression for the XOR gate?
What is the Boolean expression for the OR gate?
What is the Boolean expression for the AND gate?
What is the result of the binary division: 11001 ÷ 10?
What is the result of the binary addition: 1110 + 1101?
What is the binary equivalent of the decimal number 13?
What is the binary equivalent of the decimal number 6?
What is the binary equivalent of the decimal number 20?
What is the binary representation of the decimal number 42?
What is the result of the binary multiplication 1010 * 1101?

string-array.name: options1
string-array.item: A truth table represents the price of logic gates
To convert analog signals to digital signals

string-array.name: options2
string-array.item: To appreciate the timeless nature of electronics
A truth table defines the lifespan of a computer
To convert digital signals to analog signals

string-array.name: options3
string-array.item: To adapt to evolving technology trends
A truth table lists all possible input and output combinations
Combines multiple digital inputs into one output
To count the number of input pulses

string-array.name: options4
string-array.item: Applying digital electronics principles in practical applications
A truth table summarizes the plot of a novel
To convert analog signals to digital
To convert analog signals to digital signals
